committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the United States House of Representatives that the United States Postal Service should issue a postage stamp honoring Walter Camp, the organizer of the game of football in the United States.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the U.S. Postal Service should issue a postage stamp honoring Walter Camp, the organizer of the game of football in the United States.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the United States House of Representatives that the United States Postal Service should issue a postage stamp honoring Walter Camp, the organizer of the game of football in the United States.
